DAMN! homecoming was fucking awesome! it was un-fucking-describable.. i danced way too much, way more than i've ever danced in my life oi! well.. anyway i'm at morg's house now she slept at my house last night  we went to homecoming with a limo which was sweeeet i loved everyone that was in the limo. and renee and i were all over TJ like woah! i hate how someone was trying to dance like i was so i just kept cutting her off and danced way better! ahah i can't wait til' my partay! that's going to be crazay!! well i'm going to go friday was just a perfect night i can't explain i guess if you were with me you would know 

oh yeah 4 1/2 til' month i can get my license and a car.. tee hee much love everyone good luck with everything you want to accomplish :)

Man! Angii's party was "bumpin" sorry, but in the beginning it was eh' then it became aaaaalright!!!! yay-ya it was definitely fun right?? - yes. she got thrown in the pool how many times ahah noice! everyone got lapdances and stuff women kids and men of all ages and sizes tee hee this was better than i expected.. i love it! thanks again angii you better dance at my party or else.. :) i can't wait til' homecoming that's the next best thing oh yeah oh yeah then my P-A-R-T-A-Y! mhhhm that's gunna be slaaamin well gotta go now because i don't feel like writing any more. if you were there tonight you know what happened.. ;) much love everyone.
I WISH I HAD SOMEONE TO REALLY TALK TO.. oh man, what do i do? what do i do?

um, lately i've been busy. this saturday is friggin crazy. sheeeeesh! um, i need to wake up early to go to Alli's house for a world history project and that's from around 9/10-??. then my mom is going to the place where i'm having my sweet 16-kind of like just to set up some stuff, like the food about how many people. i think i'm aloud to have 60 PERFECT! then i need to go to morgan's house because i want to do it on Powerpoint and she has it and from there... ANGII's partay! wahoo. so yeah definitely a busy saturday then sunday needs to be any extra homework and laundry. oh yeah my mom got promoted from being a bank teller to a loan officer. double the money man! she even offered to pay me for doing laundry, but as sincere as i am i didn't accept. i thought it was wrong. but yeah i'm happy i'm taking lessons this saturday at least i wanted to possibly saturday. and now with homecoming coming up i need to get my eyebrows done and a pedicure.. aah that'll feel good. i need one. i've been a little stressed lately. um, every wednesday so far i have and will be going to my friends youth group it's really very fun and i see my fwends there so that's cool. we sing and praise the lord! yay-ya well.. i'm getting ready for bed. talk to you lata

walking home today was fun with John and joanna i kind of lost morgan and jason but whatever they have each other. what is meant to be will be that's all i have to say. wow! tonight was really fun i wasn't planning on going hence i didn't know about it but i'm glad i did. i went to my friend, Kianni, youth group meeting. we sang and talked about the Lord and got cool black bands - which i'll wear tomorrow - and semi-celebrated Ashley's birthday. (I know her) we had cake and pretzels and drank soda yum yum yummy in the secluded room it was just us girls and we talked about our problems i love doing that it makes me feel really gooood ;) well next week Kianni and i will be attending Rissals meeting. she better introduce us to everyone (including that hott guy!) lol morgan .. i actually saw you today how exciting mhhhm it didn't even feel like a wednesday today definitely like the weekend or something - at least to me. some people i saw tonight were people such as mauricio and girardo and gustavo and ashley. cool cool 

to switch the topic i can't wait til' this weekend. friday i'm going out with renee i'm happy we're making TIME for eachother definitely definitely and then saturday morning i'm wanting to go dress shopping for homecoming and wanting for morgan to come - if she has time - but i'm glad her and jay are together JAY: the way you talk about her is just unexplainable sweeeet look:

Me: mmkay. how are you?
Jay: IM WONDERFUL

um well i guess that's all for today. it started off really very bad but then i saw reeeneee and it got soo much better. that was the third time i've seen her this year. and kathyrn to i miss her we see each other only twice a day that's not a lot to converse about certain things but whatever at least i have both lunches with her... I'M OUT!

i'll like to start off by saying, i pray that my teachers' wife gets concieved > they have tried so hard and i believe he deserves it. pray with me if you'd like.

well, anyway everyday i try to go walking. not just for the excercise, but because i get to talk to someone about my problem. hopefully she won't tell anyone.. but it's cool. we walk and sweat a little bit, but before we know it we're home. thanks rissal i appreciate it. since i'm off work til' next thursday, maybe we can try to go everday but wednesday.. mmkay?!!?

Mowgan > i have a note for you, but since you leave me afterschool so early, i don't get to see you. i believe you told me you also had one for me.. can't wait! heh um love you 

well.. when something cool/interesting happens i'll let you know. oh yeah i'm getting another job so i'm going to have two jobs. buh bye ya guys

tonight was the shit... if you were there and you agreed tonight was fcuking awesome! - let me know! i went to pompano indoor again and it was amazing nine month anniversary sang my song woah! that's a little nuts! my song is: devil in jersey city by coheed and cambria. boy when i heard them as morg was standing next to me i was fcuk yeah that's my song REPRESENT! i saw Matt (nick) and everybody i guess i didn't mind seeing. i saw angii for the first time since the last day of school last year. fcuking nuts ok.. because i didn't know she was going to be there. and i also didn't know that michael hernandez was going to be there. ::HIGH FIVE:: tonight was a little stinky on the way home i hope you guys take shower 3 times a day tomorrow. and morg don't forget about sneakers air freshner hehe morgan is my GREAT! i love you soo much i read things sometimes to tell friends that you love that before it's too late. so i fcuking love you morgan and i hope i never lose you. and that goes to all my closest friends. 

ELBOW!! (joke if you know it HOLLA) 

well.. i'm going to go "it's late i'm faultering. "

tonight was fcuking awesome! me and gang went to Don Carters. we got there and were waiting for some people to show up and they eventually did :) from what felt like forever! after like an hour being there we started playing and time after time i got betta and betta. so then i won! um mason won the first game because he just did then i kicked it off the next game. every time i bowled i ended up with a pink pin (if you leave that one standing alone you've earned a free game) so i ended up getting a free game but i'm saving the card til' next friday. i've been there four fridays in a row! that' nuTs! that was my night. tomorrow i have a little party to go to from 3.30 - 5.30 at Don Carters again.. woah! then PIS with Morgan. yay-ya. i must go now i just thought i'd tell you me evening. it was awesome! some guys were madd drunk and some were just HOTT! and of course i talked to them. i'm sure mason liked it that i was dancing all over him .. ooh good times good times 
talk to you in a few

well, today i didn't go to school. my mom wanted me to go to work early - what is she nuts! oi.. well i officially found out that the guy i did like doesn't like me - but truly i don't care. i like someone else just one itty bitty problem.. he's younger then me. weird! right now i'm listening to Maroon 5 - She will be loved - thanks to Toni. my belly ring is healing very nicely. i'm thinking about my sweet 16 - i keep saying i want one, but then i say i don't, i don't know. i'm thinking about who i should invite. this weekend looks like it might be like this past weekend. on friday i'm going bowling again. anyone wanting to come may join. hopefully saturday i can join morgan at PIS again - that is if she goes but Jason is going i think right Jay? 
anyway about my 16th birthday. i have a jist about what persons i want to invite it's just that some of them i haven't talked to but i'd feel bad if i didn't invite them. i know i have a limit just not sure of how much. what do i do? aahh! "i'm sinking like a stone in sea." boy isn't that true. can you tell i put on Brand New! well.. bored as i am i guess i'm done. nothing to do here i neeed to talk to someone but that person i want to talk to isn't online and i can never talk to him alone but i need to find a way. well buh bye for now i guess

woah! tonight was definitely what i needed. everything to cheer me up ;) well, it started off with doing absolutely nothing. there i am waiting for my mom to get off work so all of a sudden my friend says HEYY so we planned to just go bowling after talking for a little while. then we went and of course i know everyone there hehe so we had major funn and to add to that it was obviously musical and smokey and colorful. ON TOP OF THAT we met guys.. steve and tim crazii they go to North Broward and then i saw Shane there and friends so that was cool oh yeah i saw kyle palmer and had to say hi him .. he was surprised. my sister was of course flirting with Walter (guy who works at foood counter) we got free food and some games. it was greeeeat! about the guys we met one was 15 the other 16 i drove a lot today from work and to bowling and stuff my boss also made me drive home with her which was kind of nerveracking but i passed her test lol tomorrow night is going to be funn joining peopple like morg at PIS um tomorrow morning i have to go to church since i'll be an aide it's a teen aide meeting so that's always fun seeing everyone from church again (not being sarcastic) overall tonight has been just great! and in school too not that bad i'm proud to say it was successful well.. got to sleep if i'm going to get up early. buh bye

 

- oh yeah morg you and jason can come in me nd friends limo for homecoming if you'd like. all i know it that it will be me renee kathryn nicole and christy i think so yeah tinkerbell about it ;)

bad mood right now. something just happened and i don't feel like sharing.. angelina - my answer is yes i'll go. october 16!! yay mine will be around february 12ish. you best go 
  


                                              - out.

+plus i have no one to talk to about this. it wierd sometimes i feel loved yet another time i feel sooo alone well sorry for making you read this if you are

well, right now i'm at work. i just found out something i don't think i want to know. the guy i like, likes my friend. i'm sooo happy for him. i hope they have fun, i really do. like everyone says, "there are plenty of fish in the fucking sea." - yeah, that's true. i don't think my day can get any worse.. but hey you never know. well.. i guess i should go and start to NOT think about this guy.. talk to you in a few.

Tonight was somewhat great! The great part was being with er'body such as, Steph, Jenn, Jamie, Mason, and people who decided to show up. We were at Don Carter's. B-b-b-b-owling. Agata works there so we all talked for a lil bit. The somewhat part was me being crushed by my love! You see, no names, he knows i like him, but no response! ::tear:: When Mason told me things that i didnt wanna know it hurt me even more.. i was a little depressed. then after the games were done we just hung around inside til the officer said we had to leave. then we all hung outside til our rides got there. Mason and my sister were flirting.. thats terrible! Mason you really hurt me nigga heh um yeah i was mostly with Jamie starving for even a little attention. but i was receiving not that much i tell ya. :( every little while he would play with me outside but thats just about it.. um Alan was there playing pool with his gay lil brother (inside joke) umm well im going to go because im tired nd talking to Mason on the phone. Hopefully Jamie calls me sunday .. HOPEFULLY! This was just a little summary of what going on tonight to see the real action lil inbetween stuff you had to be there.

well today is finally over. im at work because i wanna be yeah well im glad tomorrow is friday because tomorrow is going to be soo fuckin awesome!! wahoo! jason and morg - totally awesome! wish ya'll luck. :) see morg i predicted this ;) well anyway er'body is at lunch nd im alone so blah! my shirts were so sexi today Jay you didnt get to see it too bad so mothafuckin sad haha (fuck you later) 


jamie - you didnt meet me AGAIN!! aahh! well ill cya tomorrow morning and night ::wink wink::

well, right about now, i'm at work waiting to be picked. Jay - you best love me! lol. nice live journal by the way hehe. are you coming this friday?? its going to be me nd stephanie nd jenn nd you nd jamie and maybe more. my friend alan wants to take me to the pool hall but i wouldn't leave you guys. call me fuck ya later!

anyway school is going great! so far anywhooo! I love the people in most of my classes eh all of my classes. some classes are more boring then others but what am i going to do, just gotta make the best of it i guess. tomorrow is early release fucking finally! im not sure what im doing, or who hehe! well, my ride is almost as in my daddy so ima go seeeee ya

well right now im in computer class and im really bored! what a suprise.. well anyway tomorrow is early release and i think i have plans with someone if she doesnt cancel. then friday im going bowling with jenn stephanie my sister might have to come and jamie and maybe jason hah hes a freshman hehe i might see alan there again but if i see him in the hall like i did yesterday im going to tell him.. i invited mooooorgan but she is too busy for me :( 


<marquee> i want it to be friday already!! </marquee>

well, today Jason pissed me off the most. he fucking kicked me hes such a jerk, and immature at times... freshman! hehe and also i havent talked to mat in two days im protesting to call him and i talked to chris today (morg nd stephanie know who that is) he seems really awesome!! we might hang out this weekend nd he might come to JPT homecoming (he goes to coral glades) and i might go to his purrty cool. thursday is early release and im hanging out with kristina who i havent seen all summer unless plans change. Jamie wants me to go to his house but yeah. im at work right now not that i want to be but im waiting for my momma to pick me up. ive been driving a lot lately so its funn! 

<marquee> BORED.....BORED......BORED....</marquee>

well what can i say tonight was a b-l-a-s-t!! ok here is what happened... im alone at home and i decided hmm i should go out well i was supposed to meet up with mat tonight but i didnt think it was going to happen. then i walked to his complex which is also the same as YOU (steph) and just sat their at the lil park and talked to a couple of people on the telefono. then all of a sudden Chris walked up to me and introduced himself and now we are great buddies. but after all mat did call me back (woah!) and he joined me nd chris at the park.. lata lata lata steph came along and we just had a whole night of memories... boy was it fun! so DUR! this will definitely happen, im sure of it. :)

<marquee> me....mat....chris....steph.....wahoooo!!</marquee>

WOAH! so where do i start? today was totally awesome! no other to put it. saw all of my friends and well it just went gr-eeeeeat! i guess i like all of my teachers.. mr. askovitz is kinda crazy. i'm going to try to switch to be with my friend, er'body i know failed his class and i don't want to be part of that. then after the whole day i was about to walk to Stephanies house, but MORG CALLED! so then i met her at the light of Riverside and we walked aaaall the way over to Stephanies house. the light of coral ridge and atlantic which wasn't that bad. wahooo! i saw kathryn today! i was soo fucking excited. we have one class together and both lunches (C,A)!!! and Amanda is also in me lunch! i'm sure a billion other people like Jordan and Gang are their too. so yeah.  anyway, i saw mat again tonight! very coo very coo. he met me nd morg at stephanies and chilled their a very little while then he went home and i took stephanies bird and surprised him at his house :) hehe. then hung out their a lil while.. hmm after that we just walked to my house minus mat. :( sad, very sad. we all had a yum yum yummy! dinner at my house ask morg how delicious it was.. go on i dare ya! well i must go take a shower and straighten my hair for tomorrow. one day curly, the other straight. woo! first of school couldn't have been betta! 
i guess i look forward to tomorrow, well just the people anyway. eh! well hope you had a wonderful first day.. but if not their will be better days i promise!


oh yeah - if you didnt notice i lied about not updating.. i just feel wierd not i guess.. bye

well, tonight was a pretty cool night. kristina, steph, me nd mat were together.. :) cool dude! well, we spent most of the time on the lil' play ground.. hehe good stuff good stuff. the evening felt short but iono what ever we had fun oi! um, oh yeah. i can't forget today. we, steph, kristina, kianni, and me went to a free hip hop class... wahoo! boy, was it fun!! me nd kianni might think of joining pretty coo pretty coo :) the class was so fuckin awesome nd fun definitely not what i expected. but, DUR! the teacher was a gay guy ( literally, uh oh ) their were a couple of guys in there to, SURPRISING!, but their was one kid who was gay. weeeeeell, anyway. i'm going to watch another DVD.. stephanie is spending the 2nd night over.. ( too much of you steph lol ) 

well, see ya'll next time.

Well, tonight was supposed to be a party night. oh well, things change...:( instead, stephanie is sleeping over. we are going to watch a couple of movies and yeah. right now i'm listening to lost prophits!! wahooooo! I can't believe you Morgan, ugh!! be good, or don't get caught lol... well, we'll have to talk when you're allowed to. make sure you c-c-c-call me. well, i must go. i have phone calls to make, to people like.. Kathryn, in which she just came back from hawaii, and Mat. See ya'll lata...

let me start off with.. this day was awesome! i don't think anything went wrong. it was almost like a "perfect day!" - can there ever be a perfect day?? hmm..

yay! the guy i like finally came online...!! how exciting. but he lives in new york which is sad. but ya never know. im talking to him now... woah! you have no idea how excited i am!

well, nothing is really going on. me and my friend leandro are planning to go out this week sometime. 
i don't want any attention or anything but i feel lonely. sorry about the last entry. i was pissed at someone. but i still and will always hate them.
don't you hate it when someone plans something with you, then cancels to hang out with someone else? or when they do things that hurt you and you can't say anything? well, i'm going to go and watch my three's company. i like this show. oh yeah, i thought of a theme for my sweet 16. you're gunna have to wait til then to see it. hehe cya

BITCH! I FUCKIN HATE YOU.. LEAVE

 

I HATE YOU!!!!!

well, ok, i'm back. school is approaching just a little too soon. tonight was a great evening. we all went ice skating. i've never skated in my life so it was definitely an unforgettable evening. it was me, my sister, stephanie, morg morg, and jenn. woo hoo!! it was greeeeeeat! and then morg showed to how to do the "salt water treatment" for my belly. pretty coo pretty coo 
yay, next week were going to galaxy, for normal rollerblading. now that i know how to do, used to do it er'day back in the day. :( but it'll be cool. 

morg- those pics were awesome and funny ( when i came inside tonight for 5 minutes ) and the updates on your wall, noice! your hair was awesome, thanks to meeeee. mike has a penis head in that class one ehehe. oh yeah, and rodrigo that's funny. can't wait til' my sweeeeeeeeet 16. that's gunna be awesome. all the peoplez i love and family.. i hope my godfather can make it. he lives in Milano, Italy. 

Morg and Steph- thanks for holding me tonight heh! ;)

New York was great, by the way. obviously bought a couple of things. um, over all it was great. the best part being i got my belly pierced. it's greeeeeeeen! mwahah. my grandma, and my dad so hate it. but it's funny. i have pics that i'll post up in a lil bit.

weeeeeell, i'ma see whose online and then ima go sleep.
cya sooooon.

Hey guys! I just helped my parents pack there lil suitcase. I must share with my sister, but hey that's ok. I'm just excited to go to New York. Good thing - I might just get my belly pierced!!!! Hopefully.. not getting my hopes up, but trust me, I might just annoy her enough to get one. Her as in my mom heh. Well, I will call certain people such as Steph, and most likely Morg. Love you guys. Oh, yeah, I won't have my phone so if you want just leave a message. Love you!! ta ta for now. I'll be back the 8th. Call me then. C-ya. 

p.s. - my dog is staying at my grandmas :( I miss him already and he just left. well bye now
well, ive finished burning my second CD. i call it volume two.. heh. but now im just watching t.v. and bored as fudge. well cya
Well, I've figured out, at work, how to do this lay-out thing..!! Well, gotta go it's lunch time. cya

O, my love is like a red, red rose,
That's newly sprung in June.
O, my love is like the melodie,
That's sweetly played in tune.
 
 
As fair thou art, my bonnie lass,
So deep in love am I,
And I will love thee still, my dear,
Till a' the seas gang dry.
 
 
Till a' the seas gang dry, my dear,
And the rocks melt wi' the sun!
And I will love thee still, my dear,
While the sands o' life shall run.
 
 
And fare thee well, my only love,
And fare thee well awhile!
And I will come again, my love,
Though it were ten thousand mile!

Tonight was a poop. UGh! I don't know why I came on here. I don't really feel like talking or typing.. Well, maybe the anonymous writer is right, I have no friends. OH WELL! What can I do?!?! Well, anywayz I am going to go. Cya.

Tonight was a pretty cool night. Just casual I guess. I guess it started off pretty early I just had to tidy up my room and just do a lil' laundry. The RE was coming for an open house from 1-4, which we weren't aloud to be home while this is going on. So, I took the keys, along with my family, and we ate at DiSalvos. We also brought my dog, GUCCI!! Then, after that, I drove straight on down to the beach. We stayed a lil' more than a 1/2 hour. My sister was just taking the dog back and forth and BAM! she met a guy. His name was Brandon. I have to say he was pretty cute. He definitely had manners ;). He had come from Detroit, Michigan. He has only been here for about 3 / 4 months. So, my sister doesn't have a cell phone, and he didn't either. So, she decides to ask for his sn, but it turns out that he didn't have a computer either. He just ended up saying," I guess I'll cya around then." But, still he was such a sweet guy, of course they talked for about 15 minutes. Maybe this guy was meant to be, but I'll guess she'll never now. Unless of course it's really faith and then they meet again. ( HOPEFULLY! ) Well, I'm not really doing anything right now. I'm just excited yet mad too.. excited because I'm leaving for New York this upcoming weekend, and it's exciting to see peoplez you havent seen for over a century lol. A little upset because Paul had invited me to Warp Tour, and DUR! definitely wouldn't mind going. But, I'll be in New York. Can't have everything you wish for, now can you? If you could wish for something what would it be?? I'm not sure what I would wish for.. hmm..

Right now, I love so many people. Right now I hate certain people. The people / person I hate thinks they are the best thing that happened on this Earth. He / She thinks people can't live without them well NEW FLASH! we can. In fact, just go away!! This town doesn't need you.

My friends and I are sorta planning to go to see Spider Man 2. Oh yeah, tonight at Magnolia we all applied heh silly.. Tonight we saw Cinderella Story starring Hillary Duff, and Chad Michael Murray. HE'S DEFINITELY HOTT! I would recommend that movie. I like Hillary, and Chad.. yumm!

Well, I must go because tomorrow is starting another week. I don't even know what I'm doing online, seriously. But, whatever. Working again all this week, hopefully taking tuesday off or something, to go beaching. ;) Well, done for now. cya!

<lj-cut text="What do you really think about me">What do you really think about me.. Post anonymously, say anything. How much you hate me, how much you love me, how much you can't stand me, how much more you want to spend time/talk with me. How ugly I am. whatever. Be brutally honest. Post this in your livejournal to find out what people think about you. - Go on ... what do you? </lj-cut>

"Looking back over the years that we've been together,
I can't help but wonder: What the heck was I thinking?"
 
"Congratulations on your wedding day!
Too bad no one likes your wife."
 
"I've always wanted to have someone to hold, someone to love.
But after having met you, I've changed my mind."
 
"I must admit, you brought religion in my life.
I never believed in Hell until I met you."
 
"As the days go by, I think of how lucky I am
that you're not here to ruin it for me."
 
"Congratulations on your promotion. Before you go,
would you like to take this knife out of my back.
You'll probably be needing it again."
 
"How could two people as beautiful as you
have such an ugly baby?"
 
"Someday I hope to get married,
but not to you."
 
"I'm so miserable without you, it's almost like you're here."
 
"Congratulations on your new bundle of joy.
Did you ever find out who the father was?"
 

"Your friends and I wanted to do something special for
your birthday...so we're having you put to sleep."

Well, tonight didn't go as planned. I was planning to go to the movies with my friend, Renee. We were going to go see Sleepover, but it turned out it was only playing at 5:20. Phst! I was out with my momma at 5:20. Speaking of out, I drove a lot today. It was awesome! Anyway, back to the movies. Since 5 o' clock was too early we decided to go tomorrow night, as in Friday. Which is kewl, it don't make a difference to me anywayz. Anchorman was playing at 7:15 and 9:30. But, she didn't wanna see that so yeah. Well, nothing interesting really happened today, except for the thing with my sister. Oh yeah, Morgan make sure you call me when your away por favor. Oh, and Morg, the thing with my sister happened again today. OI!  Well, then I'm off to sleep in about any second. Tomorrow I have a whole day of work ahead of me. I'm working from 8:30 am - 6:30 pm. Can you say long hours? - I can. Well, cya.

Post anonymously, say anything. How much you hate me, how much you love me, how much you can't stand me, how much more you want to spend time/talk with me. How ugly I am. whatever. Be brutally honest. Post this in your livejournal to find out what people think about you. - Go on ... what do you think about me??

Have you ever wondered which hurts the most?
Saying something and wishing you hadn't?, or
Saying nothing and wishing you had?

I guess the most important things are the hardest things to say.

 

Don't be afraid to tell someone you love them. If you do, they might break your heart...if you don't, you might break theirs.


Have u ever decided not 2 become a couple because you were so afraid of losing what you already had with that person?

Your heart decides whom it likes and whom it doesn't.
You can't tell your heart what to do. It does it on its own........when you least suspect it, or even when you don't want it to.

Have you ever wanted to love someone with everything you had, but that other person was too afraid to let you in and love them?

Too many of us stay walled up because we are too afraid to care too much...for fear that the other person does not care as much, or even at all.

Have you ever denied your feelings for someone because your fear of rejection was too hard to handle?

We tell lies when we are afraid... afraid of what we
don't know, afraid of what others will think, afraid of what will be found out about us.

But every time we tell a lie, the thing we fear grows stronger.

Life is all about risks and it requires you to jump!

Don't be a person who has to look back and wonder what they would have done, or could have had.

* What would you do if every time you fell in love you had to say good-bye?

*What would you do if every time you wanted someone they would never be there?

*What would you do if your best friend died tomorrow and you never got to tell them how you felt?

(even if it is that you don't care anymore and they used to be ur best friend)

*What would you do if you loved someone more than ever and you couldn't have them?

*What would you do if you never got the chance to say I am friends with all of my family and they know I love them?*

People live, but people die. I want to tell you that
you are a friend.

If you died tomorrow (God Forbid)
you would be in my heart.
Would I be in yours?

If you care about me as much as I care about you, you will answer any questions in this poem


You might be best friends one year, pretty good friends the next year, don't talk that often the next, and don't want to talk at all the year after that .. but now im calling it, we're friends...i consider you mine . . . do u consider me urs?

So, I just wanted to say, even if I never talk to you again in my life, you are special to me and you have made a difference in my life,

 

At one point in my life you were or still are very important to me, therefore you hold a special place in my heart now, then and forever!



I look up to you, respect you, and truly cherish you and all our times together.

This is to all my friends, no matter how often  we talk, or how close we are.

Let old friends know you haven't forgotten them, and tell new friends you never will.


Remember, everyone needs a friend someday you might feel like you have NO FRIENDS at all, just remember this and take comfort in knowing
somebody out there cares about you and .. always will..

I care about YOU !! Do you care about me?
